TopicTitle: Crew compartments for new B9 parts

Articles.Content:
Just a thought. B9 now offers the possibilities of having large starships, but there are no crew compartments !

Maybe create something that can appear to be a flat part that actually allows for holding crew, like maybe a crew berth, for up to four or five Kerbals? I have a couple of ideas but do not understand how to create the parts or what programs I would need to use. If anyone either wants to take up this project or give me some pointers in how to get started, then I would do it myself and would greatly appreciate it (and would give you credit when I finally make something decent enough to use).

What about a control pod or command room, or command bridge that actually looks good on larger starships...

Just a couple of ideas
